mapper.insert: insert into point_merchandise_receiver_info( user_id, receiver_name, receiver_address, receiver_phone, receiver_post_code, update_time, create_time, is_deleted )values( #{pointMerchandiseReceiverInfo.userId}, #{pointMerchandiseReceiverInfo.receiverName}, #{pointMerchandiseReceiverInfo.receiverAddress}, #{pointMerchandiseReceiverInfo.receiverPhone}, #{pointMerchandiseReceiverInfo.receiverPostCode}, #{pointMerchandiseReceiverInfo.updateTime}, #{pointMerchandiseReceiverInfo.createTime}, #{pointMerchandiseReceiverInfo.isDeleted} )
